faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: How does the GPS search work?
faq.a1: Simply enable your device's GPS, and Truxel will automatically search for logistics companies within a 5km radius of your current location. Results include company name, contact details, and exact location.
faq.q2: What's included in the free trial?
faq.a2: The free trial includes 5 searches, access to basic company information, email and WhatsApp templates, lead management, and CSV export. No credit card required.
faq.q3: How many searches do I get per month?
faq.a3: It depends on your plan: Trial (5 total), Standard (15/month), Pro (30/month). You can also purchase additional search packs anytime.
faq.a4: Yes! All plans include CSV export functionality. You can export your entire lead list with all contact details and notes anytime.
faq.a5: The Community feature lets you post your availability or available routes, and see posts from other drivers. It's a great way to find cargo opportunities and connect with fellow truckers.
faq.a6: We support 6 languages: English, Romanian, Polish, Turkish, Lithuanian, and Spanish. You can switch languages anytime in your profile settings.
faq.q7: How do I cancel my subscription?
faq.a7: You can cancel anytime from your profile settings. You'll continue to have access until the end of your current billing period, with no additional charges.
faq.a8: Absolutely. We use industry-standard encryption, secure EU servers via Supabase, and are fully GDPR compliant. Your data is never shared with third parties without your consent.

faq.q1: Which Truxel plan fits my operation?
faq.a1_part_standard: Standard gives independent drivers 30 monthly company searches and daily posts to stay booked.
faq.a1_part_pro: Pro adds LinkedIn contacts, AI matching, and advanced research for growing teams.
faq.a1_part_fleet: Fleet Manager unlocks 30 daily posts, 30 simultaneous listings, and 72-hour visibility for dispatch teams.
faq.a1_part_freighter: Pro Freighter delivers everything plus analytics, priority support, and 50 daily posts for serious forwarders.
faq.a2: Yes! You can upgrade or downgrade anytime from your account settings. Changes take effect immediately for upgrades, or at the end of your billing period for downgrades.
faq.a3: We accept all major credit cards and process payments securely through Stripe. You'll be billed monthly on the date you subscribe. All transactions are encrypted and we never store your card details.
faq.q4: What's the difference between searches and posts?
faq.a4_part_search: Searches help you find potential customers (shippers and freight forwarders) in specific locations with full contact details.
faq.a4_part_post: Posts let you advertise your availability or loads to the community so others can find you. Both work together to grow your network.
faq.q5: Do I keep access if I cancel?
faq.a5: Yes, but you must export your data to Excel before your subscription ends. After that, access is lost.
